briefTitle: Preventing Non-communicable Diseases in Guatemala Through Sugary Drink Reduction

armGroups.label: Calorie/Control Poster
interventionNames: Behavioral: Exposure to beverage calorie information

armGroups.label: SSB Warning and Non-SSB Promotion Poster
interventionNames: Behavioral: Exposure to beverage health information
Behavioral: Exposure to beverage calorie information

armGroups.label: Baseline for SSB Warning and Non-SSB Promotion Poster

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Between 12 and 18 years old
* Made a food or beverage purchase
* Has permission from parent or caregiver to participate
* Has not yet completed the purchase assessment

Exclusion Criteria:

* Under 12 or over 18 years old
* Did not make a food or beverage purchase
* Parent or caregiver refused to give child permission to participate
* Already participated in the purchase assessment

outcomeMeasures.title: Volume of SSBs Per Transaction
outcomeMeasures.description: Total milliliters of SSBs per transaction from sales data

outcomeMeasures.title: Beverage Calories Per Transaction
outcomeMeasures.description: Total number of calories for all beverages (SSBs and non-SSBs) per transaction from sales data

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Calories Per Transaction
outcomeMeasures.description: Total number of calories for all food and beverages (SSBs and non-SSBs) per transaction from purchase assessments (e.g., calories from Coke + bag of chips)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Transactions With SSBs Out of All Food and Beverage Transactions
outcomeMeasures.description: Percentage of participants with transactions that have sugar sweetened beverages out of all participants who had food and beverage transactions

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Transactions With SSBs Out of All Beverage Transactions
outcomeMeasures.description: Percentage of participants with transactions that have sugar sweetened beverages out of all participants who had beverage transactions

outcomeMeasures.title: Unhealthy Perceptions of SSBs
outcomeMeasures.description: Average of perceptions of healthiness (measured on Likert scales) for two items (1=Extremely unhealthy; 7=Extremely healthy, lower values are more accurate)

outcomeMeasures.title: Healthy Perceptions of Non-SSBs
outcomeMeasures.description: Average of perceptions of healthiness (measured on Likert scales) for two items (1=Extremely unhealthy; 7=Extremely healthy, higher values are more accurate)

outcomeMeasures.title: Perceived Influence of Poster Among Those Who Saw it
outcomeMeasures.description: "Do you think the poster influenced what you purchased?" (1=Not at all; 5=Very much, higher values in the intervention condition indicate the intervention is perceived to be effective)

outcomeMeasures.title: Poster Message Trust
outcomeMeasures.description: "How much do you trust the information on the poster?" (1=Not at all; 5=Very much, higher values in the intervention condition indicate the intervention is perceived to be trustworthy)
